amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 118 from the bill that prevents energy leases in ANWR.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 143 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to strike section 118 from the bill that prevents energy leases in ANWR.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 233 (Roll no. 384).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 233 (Roll no. 384).
